Summary: hardball with chris matthew coverage of barack obama rally
divs: Sighting DetailsAt 6:40 on Hardball with Chris Matthews while showing footage of Barack Obama speaking at a rally in (unknown location) from right to left passses a clear ufo with no visible wings moving at a high rate of speed clearly...... I happened to catch it and have it recorded on my DVR... Pretty good stuff... Check it out... I was watching the coverage . I thought it was a ufo at first sight... I was excited and shocked... It goes behind the stage...
